title: Best of The Herd: 03/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/15/2019
description:
Colin gives his NFL free agency grades, why we need to slow down on the Cleveland Browns, and getting rid of Arizona Cardinals QB Josh Rosen. FSR host Rob Parker also stops by to discuss the issues with the Los Angeles Lakers.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
